commands.title: Find and open Character Sheet
commands.description: Finds an actor given -name <name>, and opens its sheet. E.g. -name "John Doe"

commands.title: Find and open Character Sheet
commands.description: Search 'actor: <name>' and open the sheet of that actor.

commands.title: Find and open Item Sheet
commands.description: Finds an item given -name <name>, and opens its sheet. E.g. -name "John Doe"

commands.title: Find and open Item Sheet
commands.description: Search 'item: <name>' and open the sheet of that actor.
